content: add a splash of tropical whimsy to your bathroom with this adorable flamingo toilet paper cover crochet pattern this fun and quirky flamingo design turns a roll of toilet paper into a charming piece of decor that s sure to make guests smile pattern details * written in english using us crochet terms * skill level intermediate * includes detailed instructions and helpful youtube tutorials fits large toilet paper rolls what you ll need worsted weight yarn in pink white and black crochet hook size g/4 0mm or size needed for gauge fiberfill stuffing for the head and neck yarn needle stitch marker and safety eyes large toilet paper roll 5 diameter x 4 tall pipe cleaner flexible foam curler perfect for * gifting to flamingo lovers * adding flair to guest bathrooms * fun housewarming or gag gifts with a handmade twist * approximately 8 5 tall this pattern is available as a free download in the file section of my fingers fly crochet family group on facebook link text 1 1 https //www facebook com/share/g/16kvwvpkic/
